content:
CredentialType CredentialType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Defines the valid kinds of security credentials.

Edit

In this Article

public enum CredentialTypePublic Enum CredentialType

Fields

Claims Claims

The claims token acquired from STS (security token service).
None None

No credential defined (default).
Windows Windows

The active directory domain credential.
X509 X509

The X509 certificate.
